so_refund_code,
so_id,
creator_id,
fubi_account_batch_id,

#{soId},
#{creatorId},
#{fubiAccountBatchId},

mapper.update:
UPDATE so_refund
so_refund_code = #{soRefundCode},
so_id = #{soId},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
fubi_account_batch_id = #{fubiAccountBatchId},
cash_account_batch_id = #{cashAccountBatchId},
so_refund_by_fubi = #{soRefundByFubi},
so_refund_by_cash = #{soRefundByCash},
so_refund_reason = #{soRefundReason},
remark = #{remark},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
user_id = #{userId},
third_refund_code = #{thirdRefundCode},
biz_id = #{bizId},
platform_id = #{platformId},
jidian_account_batch_id =#{jidianAccountBatchId},
so_refund_by_jidian =#{soRefundByJidian},
refund_state = #{refundState},
so_refund_by_buy_card = #{soRefundByBuyCard},
buy_card_account_batch_id = #{buyCardAccountBatchId},
WHERE id = #{id}
